::Hevn::

Hevn: Understood.

Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:                                  
Nightlight:
  
 "Yes I'm "said the femme "Hold on, I'm go to speak  with someone who could  open you the base... be carefull, we dont know what  will happen"
  
  
    ----- Original Message ----- 
   From:    Richard    Allen 
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   Sent: Tuesday, November 27, 2007 11:25    PM
   Subject: Re: Hevng G2
   

      ::Hevn::

Hevn: I'm alive and well. I'm at the main entrance to the    Maximal base in the city. is that where you are    located?

Airshadow <airly2002@...>    wrote:   
          
     Nightligjt:
      
     "Hevn????"Answered supriced the femme"Are you      alive?" she added with some alarm "Hevn try to come quickly here, minions      are around... I''ll speak with Lord perseus or anoter staff member in order      allow you the entrace"
      
            -----        Original Message ----- 
       From:        Richard        Allen 
       To:        nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com  
       Sent:        Monday, November 26, 2007 10:52 AM
       Subject:        Hevng G2
       

              ::Hevng::

The clone of Nightlight's former bodyguard fought        through the terrain and weather for sometime before eventually arriving at        Atlantis. He transforms to robot mode and would read as a Maximal. No one        could know that he was a clone being controlled by Lord Jhiaxus of the G2        Decepticon Empire. Hevng walks into the open areas of the city before        coming to the Maximal base. He opens a comm channel on an old personal        channel used by Rodimus' family and friends.

Hevng: Nightlight, do        you read?
